initiate:
(:action initiate_new_member
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (not (member-initiated ?npc ?ss))
                    (closest-friend ?npc)
                    (not (society-formed ?ss)))
    :effect (and
              (member-initiated ?npc ?ss)
              (society-formed ?ss))
  )

;; Action 2: Set Meeting Location
set:
(:action set_meeting_location
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (meeting-location-set ?ss)))
    :effect (meeting-location-set ?ss)
  )

;; Action 3: Set Dress Code
(:action set_dress_code
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (dress-code-set ?ss)))
    :effect (dress-code-set ?ss)
  )

;; Action 4: Teach New Member Secret
create:
(:action create_new_member
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - person)
    :precondition (and
                    (member-initiated ?npc)
                    (member-initiated ?ss)
                    (not (member-created ?npc)))
    :effect (member-created ?npc)
  )

  ;; Action 4: Set dress code
  
(:action create_name
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (name-created ?ss)))
    :effect (name-created ?ss)
  )

;; Action 6: Create Secret
(:action create_secret
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (secret-created ?ss)))
    :effect (secret-created ?ss)
  )

;; Action 7: Read Cliques Info
teach:
(:action teach_new_member_secret
    :parameters (?adrian - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (member-initiated ?adrian ?ss)
                    (not (member-knows-secret ?adrian ?ss)))
    :effect (member-knows-secret ?adrian ?ss)
  )

;; Action 5: Create Name
read:
(:action read_cliques_info
    :parameters (?npc - person ?ss - secret_society)
    :precondition (and
                    (society-formed ?ss)
                    (not (cliques-info-read ?npc ?ss)))
    :effect (cliques-info-read ?npc ?ss)
  )
```

These actions capture the steps and descriptions provided for creating a secret society (cult), ensuring that key elements such as initiation, meeting locations, dress codes, and secrets are properly represented in the PDDL actions.
